text: Munio Pillinger was a male Austrian international table tennis player. == Career == He won two bronze medals at the 1926 World Table Tennis Championships in the men's doubles with Paul Flussmann and men's singles and a silver medal in the men's team. Two years later he won a silver medal at the 1928 World Table Tennis Championships in the men's team event. == See also == * List of table tennis players * List of World Table Tennis Championships medalists == References == Category:Austrian male table tennis players Category:World Table Tennis Championships medalists
title: Munio Pillinger
